elements.name: panel2
elements.title: For each example, indicate which of the following legal terms is central to the case in question: delay in delivery, defective delivery, reminder transaction, fixed-date transaction, guarantee, product liability, obligation to inspect, obligation to notify

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Manuel bought a new smartphone a good year ago. He returns it to the store because the touchscreen no longer responds. He has always handled the device carefully and properly.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Ali has put the new microwave oven into operation properly, but a fire breaks out and damages a table.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Tina orders a delivery of goods for the store for March 27.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Sheena checks the incoming goods delivery against the delivery bill.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Kevin complains to the supplier because the products he ordered did not arrive on the agreed delivery date.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Sabrina orders pants for the fall collection from the supplier, but the exact delivery date is not yet fixed.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Rita unpacks the goods that have arrived but are unfortunately defective and immediately informs the supplier.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Dilek checks the goods that have arrived and notices that 10 pieces of all varieties are missing.
